text:
Geoblink|Madrid|Product Manager|Full-time |ONSITE|45K-55K €

Geoblink was founded in March 2015 with the goal of revolutionising the world of Location Intelligence and the way businesses think about, and act upon location intelligence data. We’ve already made some huge waves in the industry, raised more than 6M Euros in investment from top venture capital firms so far and been named by Bloomberg as ‘one of the 50 most promising startups of the world’

To find out more you can email mrodrigues@geoblink.com or apply here https://www.geoblink.com/work-with-us/senior-product-manager...
